news.title: Europe to host 3rd International GPLv3 Conference: Barcelona, Spain, June 22nd & 23rd
news.body: The conference will take place in Barcelona, Spain, and the exact venue will be announced soon. In January, a year-long public consultation process for updating the GNU General Public License was launched. Commonly called "the GPL", this licence is used by the majority of Free Software to detail the distribution terms of the software.
